files.description: One-file smoke/repro script that captures full stdout/stderr and rich environment metadata, probes crash boundaries (startup vs filesystem vs imports), and writes a timestamped log under /outputs/qa/logs/ with clear stage demarcations and exit codes.

missionDescription: Reproduce the failure with the smallest possible script, capture full stderr/stdout + environment metadata, identify the crash boundary (startup vs. filesystem vs. imports), implement a one-file smoke test that writes a timestamped log under /outputs/qa/logs/.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Unblocks the ability to run the 3-claim pilot by fixing the root cause of execution failures (“container lost”), enabling any execution-backed QA artifacts and time-to-evidence tracking....
